respondent.name: Mrs. P. Wolf
respondent.certification: I am a cigarette smoker 21 years of age or older. I am also willing to receive free samples of cigarettes in the mail, subject to federal law.

questions.question: Is your regular brand Regular/King Size?
Is your regular brand Menthol or Non-Menthol?
Is your regular brand Filter or Non-Filter?
Is your regular brand Lowest/1 mg Tar, Medium, or Full Flavor?
How many packs of cigarettes have you smoked in the past two weeks?
questions.note: Write in exact number of packs for each. Note: 1 carton = 10 packs.

questions.question: What, if any, was your previous brand?
The next time you go to the store, if your regular brand were not available, what would you do?
options: Go to another store to buy my regular brand
Wait until the store has my regular brand

questions.question: Which of the following best describes you?
Which of the following statements best describes the way you use cigarette coupons?
options: I use almost any cigarette coupon I get.
I occasionally use coupons for cigarettes, even if they are not for my regular brand.
I only use coupons if they are for my regular brand.
I never use coupons to buy cigarettes.

questions.question: Is there another smoker in your household 21 years of age or older?
Would you be interested in receiving information about offers, such as a free gift with purchase, a 2-for-1, or special prices?
